title: In case where layout is submitted along with proposed Development Plan Road, in such cases TDR shall be permissible for entire road width as per these regulations
clause_text: In case where layout is submitted along with proposed Development Plan Road, in such cases TDR shall be permissible for entire road width as per these regulations. development or construction of the amenity on the reserved or deemed reserved land;
section: Cases eligible for Transferable Development Rights (TDR)
